title: Digital Twin SenseHat
description: DigitalTwin App for a SenseHat Demo
detailedDescription:
### openPlatform Digital Twin Demo

============================

**How to use: **

- To execute the demo directly:

  - Unzip on a directory the files.

 - Modify application.yml for your configuration.

 - Compile using maven.

 - Go to /SensehatHelsinki/target

 and copy the SensehatHelsinki-0.0.1.jar on a directory of the RaspberryPi. 

  - Open a cmd on the Raspberry and go to the directory where you copy the JAR file

  - Execute the comand ```
java -jar SensehatHelsinki-0.0.1.jar
``` . 

- To extend the code, load the SpringBoot Application into a eclipse and modify the code, then compile the project and follow the previous steps.

To Access the demo go to Digital Twin Web on the Market and follow the steps.
